title: Hour 2 - Tom Vercucci (06-08-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Tom Vercucci (06-08-20)
description:
Tom Verducci tells Dan that he is confident that there will be games in the MLB this year. Tom says the down side would be so enormous if there was no baseball this season; especially with all the other leagues getting up and running.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
